import React from 'react'; import './aboutUs.css' const aboutUs=(props)=>{ return (
Who We Are
HPC is an e-learning app that aims to build an online knowledge repository. The HPC learning app makes use of original content, rich animations, interactive simulations and engaging video lessons from Indiaâ€™s brightest minds.
Mission
Our mission is to provide free, world-class education to anyone, anywhere. Anyone can learn anything for free. Education is a human right. Delivering world class learning experience, We try to make learning contextual and visual, and not just theoretical. The app has been designed to adapt to the unique learning style of every individual
Our Team
This is a guided project under Prof. Rupesh Nasre , Faculty CSE ,IITM. The team consists of 8 members
Adit

) }; export default aboutUs;
